z_title:
Medical Center for Holistic Wellness 
 on the Adriatic Coast
z_title2: A space where soul and body merge, undergoing a process of recovery and reset.
z_title3: Garden Recovery — a beneficial stop on your journey. A place for finding or restoring inner peace, physical healing, and self-discovery.

z_title4.title: Programs based on the philosophy of balancing the four elements:
z_title4.sub: Water — cleansing and relaxation Earth — stability and grounding Fire — energy and transformation Air — lightness and freedom

box2.tx1: Garden Recovery offers programs that encompass all aspects of human life — body, mind, and soul. The human body is a remarkable organism that requires care. By choosing a holistic approach to recovery and relaxation at Garden Recovery, you choose to truly love and care for your body.
box2.tx2: The program is tailored individually, taking into account the guest’s characteristics and preferences.
box2.tx3: Garden Recovery emphasizes the importance of wholeness through the rich natural environment of the Adriatic. Montenegro’s location is unique, combining mountains, sea, and forests in one place.
box2.tx4: Garden Recovery is located in a secluded place where the combination of the Adriatic Sea and mountain range ensures silence and peace for guests.
box2.tx5: Accommodation in a five-star hotel with a sea view

box3.title: PROGRAMS
box3.subtitle: Light - basic detox program Standard - recovery through the '4 elements' program Personal plan - a program tailored to the guest’s needs and characteristics

box4.title: Four Elements Program

‘Water cleanses. Earth supports. Fire awakens energy.
Air helps liberate.’

items.item1: Standard package + individual tests (as recommended by the doctor)

items.item3: Detox programs with IV drips: Standard set (10 types of drips)
items.item6: Psychiatric and psychological support (as needed: consultations with a psychiatrist, addiction specialist, psychotherapist)

items.item1: Physiotherapy (hardware-based, requiring minimal space and investment)

item1.name: Roman Konevichev
item1.description: Head of the Garden Recovery Center.

item2.name: Denis Makarovsky
item2.description: Clinical psychologist, PhD, head of wellness programs. Certified specialist with international experience. Expert in psychotherapy, psychosomatics, rehabilitation, and burnout therapy.

item3.name: Valeria Bulgakova
item3.description: Consulting psychologist. Conducts individual sessions, helping guests find inner resources and overcome crisis states.

item4.name: Elena Egorova
item4.description: Family and individual psychologist. Helps restore harmony in relationships, reduces anxiety and emotional tension.

items.item2: Single and double suites with sea views
items.item3: Combination of the Adriatic Sea and mountain range
items.item4: Rooms equipped with weighted blankets and orthopedic pillows
items.item5: Yandex Alice with personalized meditation program selection

box8.title: Single Suite
box8.sub:
Room for one person with a spacious
bed, kitchen, relaxation area, bathroom, and
balcony with a sea view

box9.title: Double Suite
box9.sub:
Room for two people with a separate bedroom, relaxation
area, kitchen, bathroom, and terrace with a sea view

box10.title: Nutrition
box10.sub: Selection of only fresh, high-quality products and a balanced menu

items.item6: Option to order food delivery from a restaurant

footer.sub:
Want to recover and rest in a way that benefits your body?
It’s time to press the ‘SOS’ button and move to a place of true, high-quality recovery and rejuvenation.
Welcome to Garden Recovery — a space where soul and body merge, undergoing a process of recovery and reset.
